data.title: Infor digital multi channel marketing solutions
data.meta_description: Infor digital multi channel marketing solutions  - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Meet customer expectations in a digital world Customers are increasingly adopting digital, social, and mobile technologies. Businesses like yours need to keep pace with these changes. While 24x7 access to information was a novel experience in the not-so-distant past, customers now expect to have a completely virtual and synchronized experience across your enterprise via multiple access points, including mobile phones, tablets, face-to-face encounters, kiosks, and call centers. Take advantage of the customer revolution Your customers know their value to your company, expect to be recognized and rewarded for loyalty, and are willing to seek out a new source if you fail to meet their expectations for service, price, access, or any other ever-evolving area of importance. But don’t be discouraged. You can make the customer revolution work to your advantage with Infor® Digital Multi-channel Marketing Solutions, including Infor Epiphany® and Infor Orbis. Maximize the return on your marketing investment Make every customer interaction count, no matter which channel you use. You’ll be able to respect customer preferences, strengthen overall ties with customers, and maximize the return on your marketing investment. You’ll also be able to quickly plan, execute, and monitor permission-based marketing campaigns across multiple customer touch points. Plus, you can: • Consistently manage ever-changing consumer privacy and protection regulations—as well as customer preferences—across all outbound and inbound channels. • Understand campaign responses, improve targeting, and drive intelligence into subsequent campaigns. • Acquire and retain more customers while improving your cross-sell and up-sell capabilities. • Enhance customer loyalty and revenues. Learn from each interaction Deliver the highest-impact offers at the moment of customer interaction with real-time customer profiles, and an optimum combination of real-time predictive analytics and cross-channel business rules. With closed-loop response tracking, you can learn from the result of each interaction, and then immediately adjust targeting for all subsequent interactions. Because of that, you can witness significant lift in each marketing channel you deploy. You’ll be able to: • Enhance customers’ experiences with your company by taking advantage of real-time customer profiles that combine historical, personal, and contextual data. • Optimize cross-selling and retention. • Execute multi-channel offers. • Drive ongoing business benefits at a reasonable cost. Infor Digital Multi-channel Marketing Solutions

2. Manage all your marketing activities Extract, aggregate, and present information clearly and simply with a centralized system that brings together valuable marketing data. That means you can efficiently manage marketing planning, marketing calendars, processes, budgets, spending, projects, creative approvals, content localization, and digital assets. You’ll be able to: • Automate marketing to improve operational efficiency, regardless of the size of your company or complexity of your marketing department. • Keep a firm grasp on all your activities, events, communications, expenditures, and resources. • Manage all your marketing activities, along with the resources and management processes required to get your programs, campaigns, and activities across the globe. Make the most of technology You can make better decisions more quickly and work more efficiently with the Infor 10x technology built in to Infor Digital Multi-channel Marketing Solutions. You’ll get: • A consumer-inspired user interface designed to increase productivity. • Automatic delivery of in-context business intelligence and relevant business data. • A powerful home page that gives you a quick view of important areas across the application. • Intuitive, interactive charts and reports. Ensure a positive customer experience Your customers have choices. In order to win their loyalty, you need to win and retain their trust. With Infor Digital Multi-channel Marketing Solutions, you can ensure your customers have a consistently positive and personalized experience across your enterprise via multiple—often simultaneous—access points. You’ll be able to maintain an ongoing, multi-channel, closed-loop dialogue throughout the customer journey, and stay in front of an ever-evolving business environment.
